channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- iPages Flipbook For WordPress
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- iPages Flipbook For WordPress

item.title: CVE-2022-4394|2024-08-03T01:41:44.467Z -- unknown -- ipages%20flipbook%20for%20wordpress
item.description: The iPages Flipbook For WordPress plugin through 1.4.6 does not sanitise and escape some of its settings, which could allow users such as contributor+ to perform Stored Cross-Site Scripting attacks even when the unfiltered_html capability is disallowed.
